title: Ravens v Steelers, Jaguars v Colts and Bills v Bengals: NFL week 14 – live
summary: Graham Searles will provide live updates on tonight's NFL games, featuring a matchup between the Ravens and Steelers at M&T Bank Stadium. Fans can expect timely insights and scores throughout the event. Tune in for all the action and highlights.

title: Brighton bans Guardian from stadium over reporting on Tony Bloom
summary: A Premier League club has imposed a ban on reporters and photographers, citing concerns over the nature of their reporting. A spokesperson from The Guardian stated that their coverage serves the public interest. The ban highlights tensions between the club and the media regarding transparency and accountability.

title: Fulham 1-2 Crystal Palace: Premier League – as it happened
summary: Marc Guehi scored a late header to secure victory in an exciting match. The game featured a stunning goal from Harry Wilson that captivated fans. Overall, it showcased thrilling moments and intense competition.

title: Crystal Palace up to fourth after Marc Guéhi’s late header stuns Fulham
summary: Eddie Nketiah scored the opening goal in Crystal Palace's 2-1 victory over Fulham. Harry Wilson equalized for Fulham with a first-half goal. The match ended with Palace securing the win.

title: Man arrested after people at Heathrow allegedly attacked with ‘form of pepper spray’
summary: Police suspect that an incident at an airport car park involved the theft of a suitcase, with the individuals involved being acquaintances. Investigators are looking into the circumstances surrounding the event. Further details about the suspects or the suitcase's contents have not been released.
